subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[knot]]; [[tie]]
# to [[solidify]]
# to [[end]]; to [[finish]]
# to [[bind]]; to [[join]]; to [[connect]]
# to [[bear]] (fruit)

subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=けち
|kanon=けつ
|on=けい
|kun=
むす-ぶ,
ゆ-う<ゆ-ふ,
ゆ-わう<ゆ-はふ,
ゆ-わえる<ゆ-はへる,
いわ-える<いは-へる,
いわ-く<いは-く,
かた-なす,
かた-ぬ,
かた-める,
す-く
|nanori=ゆい
}}

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|結晶|けっしょう}}: a [[crystal]]
* {{ja-r|結構|けっこう}}: [[quite]]; [[very well]]
* {{ja-r|結婚|けっこん}}: a [[marriage]]
* {{ja-r|結婚式|けっこんしき}}: a [[wedding]]
* {{ja-r|結婚する|けっこんする|linkto=結婚}}: to [[marry]], to [[get married]]
* {{ja-r|結果|けっか}}: a [[result]]
* {{ja-r|結末|けつまつ}}: an [[end]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
* [[團結]] (단결) unity; solidarity
* [[集結]] (집결) gathering
* [[連結]] (연결) connection; linking
* [[結合]] (결합) union cohesion
* [[結付]] (결부) linking; involving
* [[結婚]] (결혼) marriage; wedding
* [[姊妹結緣]] (자매결연) sisterhood relationship
* [[結果]] (결과) result
* [[結局]] (결국) eventually
* [[結論]] (결론) conclusion
* [[結末]] (결말) conclusion; an end
* [[結實]] (결실) bearing fruit; fruition
* [[結核]] (결핵) tuberculosis
